# Set up 

```{r}
#| label: packages and data

library(tidyverse) # general use package
library(lterdatasampler) # package of datasets


data(pie_crab) # crab size dataset
```

# Exploratory data visualization

```{r}
#| label: latitude and size plot
#| message: false

# base layer: gggplot
ggplot(data = pie_crab, # dataset
       aes(x = latitude, # x-axis should be latitude, y-axis is crab size
           y = size)) + 
  # first layer: points to represent individual crabs 
    geom_point()
```
